channel.title: +Rep till 5 If you Help!
channel.description:
How do I add entry messages??
Example: "The owner has Logged in!!"
Giving ++Rep till 5 if you help :)

item.title: +Rep till 5 If you Help!
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

Look for if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase
till you see somthing like this

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("[name]"))PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" The OWNER of the server has logged in!";

then add that
ENJOY!

yer btw its me dist.

Read full topic

item.title: +Rep till 5 If you Help!
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

[quote=“pimping one, post:7, topic:154771”]its reasons like this, why repuatation doesnt m[quote author=Vert link=topic=211409.msg1849012#msg1849012 date=1193529190]
How do I add entry messages??

Example: “The owner has Logged in!!”

Giving ++Rep till 5 if you help
[/quote]its reasons like this, why repuatation doesnt mean anything… but you spawn an npc then you got into ur npc handler

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC NUMBER) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "MESSAGE HERE"; } }[/quote]

Ermm know im confused of What one he Wants lol

item.title: +Rep till 5 If you Help!
item.dc:creator: @pimping_one Pimping One
item.description:
@pimping_one wrote:

its reasons like this, why repuatation doesnt m[quote=“Vert, post:1, topic:154771”]How do I add entry messages??

Example: “The owner has Logged in!!”

Giving ++Rep till 5 if you help :)[/quote]its reasons like this, why repuatation doesnt mean anything… but you spawn an npc then you got into ur npc handler

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC NUMBER) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "MESSAGE HERE"; } }

item.title: +Rep till 5 If you Help!
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

Ok look for

SendWeapon((playerEquipment[playerWeapon]), GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));

Then Below it add

[code]if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lost homie”))
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Lost Homie the owner logged in!!!”;code]

[/code]
Then change Lost Homie to your name
